name: Lost World Adventure Land
description: {'Information': ['Lost World Adventure Land is an expansive family-friendly adventure park located within the Centara Grand Mirage Beach Resort in Pattaya, Thailand.', 'The park offers a variety of indoor and outdoor activities designed to entertain visitors of all ages.'], 'Key Features': ["SkyRider: Experience Thailand's first-ever SkyRider, a thrilling aerial ride that lets you soar above the park, providing a bird's-eye view of the surroundings.", 'SkyTrail: Navigate through two challenging obstacle courses suspended in the air, testing your balance and agility.', 'Indoor Activity Zone: Includes arts and crafts areas, a cooking studio for junior chefs, and "The Cave," which offers family-friendly entertainment such as wooden toys, a soft-play kids’ cinema, and a giant soft Lego set.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Open daily from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.']}
short_description: A family adventure park in Pattaya offering aerial courses, slides, trampolines, and creative indoor activities.

name: Beach Road
description: {'Information': ['Beach Road in Pattaya is a vibrant 4-kilometer stretch that runs parallel to Pattaya Beach, offering a dynamic blend of natural beauty, shopping, dining, and entertainment.'], 'Key Features': ['Scenic Promenade: Ideal for leisurely walks, Beach Road provides picturesque views of the Gulf of Thailand, especially during sunrise and sunset.', 'Shopping: The area boasts a variety of shopping options, from local markets to modern malls like CentralFestival Pattaya Beach, offering both international and local brands.', 'Dining: A plethora of restaurants and street food vendors line the road, serving a wide range of cuisines to satisfy diverse palates.', 'Aquarium Zone: Hosts hundreds of ocNightlife: As evening approaches, Beach Road comes alive with vibrant nightlife, featuring numerous bars, clubs, and entertainment venues. eanic fish, including clownfish, blacktip reef sharks, and giant groupers, swimming in a large cylindrical aquarium offering a 360-degree view.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Best Time to Visit: Early mornings offer a tranquil atmosphere ideal for walks, while evenings provide a lively ambiance with bustling activities.', 'Transportation: Songthaews (shared taxis) are a convenient and affordable way to navigate Beach Road and its surroundings.']}
short_description: A bustling 4-kilometer stretch in Pattaya, Beach Road offers scenic views, diverse shopping, dining, and vibrant nightlife.

name: Flower Land Pattaya
description: {'Information': ['Flower Land Pattaya is a 40-acre botanical park located in Nongprue, Pattaya, Thailand.', 'Thailand. Since its opening on December 1, 2018, the park has showcased a diverse array of both local and imported flowers, as well as rare plants, ensuring year-round floral displays.'], 'Key Features': ['Himmapan Dome: A representation of the mythical Himmapan forest, believed to be home to various legendary creatures, offering visitors a sense of utopia.', 'Inthanon Dome: Provides a nature trail amidst various winter plants, complemented by refreshing waterfalls and statues of Lanna mythical creatures known as "Mom."', 'Ocean Flowers Zone: Presents colorful flowers in various perspectives, including flower tunnels, vertical gardens, and dancing fountains with color-changing lights at night.', 'Aquarium Zone: Hosts hundreds of oceanic fish, including clownfish, blacktip reef sharks, and giant groupers, swimming in a large cylindrical aquarium offering a 360-degree view.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Open daily from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.']}
short_description: A 40-acre botanical park in Pattaya featuring diverse floral displays, themed domes, and an aquarium.

name: Swiss Sheep Farm Pattaya
description: {'Information': ['is a charming attraction located in Na Chom Thian, Chon Buri, Thailand.', 'Designed to resemble a Swiss countryside setting, the farm offers visitors an opportunity to interact with various farm animals amidst picturesque European-inspired architecture.'], 'Key Features': ['Animal Interactions: Guests can feed and pet a variety of animals, including sheep, goats, horses, rabbits, and alpacas.', 'Themed Attractions: The farm features European-style structures, including windmills and barns, providing numerous photo opportunities.', 'Family-Friendly Activities: Beyond animal encounters, visitors can enjoy activities such as archery, horse riding, and exploring a 3D gallery.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['The farm is open daily from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, with the last admission at 5:30 PM.']}
short_description: A Swiss-themed farm in Pattaya offering interactive animal experiences and family-friendly activities.

name: Monster Aquarium Pattaya
description: {'Information': ['Monster Aquarium Pattaya is a unique attraction located approximately 10 minutes from North Pattaya in Bang Lamung, Chonburi.', 'This indoor zoo and aquarium park offers visitors an immersive experience with a diverse array of exotic animals from Thailand and around the world.'], 'Key Features': ["Underwater Tunnel: A 10-meter-long tunnel provides a panoramic view of vibrant marine life, allowing guests to feel as though they're walking beneath the sea.", 'Diverse Animal Zones: The facility is divided into 16 distinct zones, each dedicated to different species, including fish, reptiles, birds, and mammals. Notable exhibits feature rare creatures such as two-headed turtles and albino crocodiles.', 'Interactive Experiences: Visitors have the opportunity to feed certain animals and engage in close-up encounters, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of the visit.'], 'Visiting Tips': ["Open daily from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM. To fully enjoy all exhibits, it's recommended to arrive early in the day."]}
short_description: An engaging indoor zoo and aquarium featuring a 10-meter underwater tunnel and 16 zones with exotic animals.

name: The Million Years Stone Park & Pattaya Crocodile Farm
description: {'Information': ['a unique attraction located approximately 9 kilometers from Pattaya City, Thailand. Spanning over 70 acres, the park combines natural wonders with wildlife exhibits, offering visitors a diverse experience.'], 'Key Features': ['Botanical Displays: Visitors can explore beautifully landscaped gardens featuring a variety of exotic plants and flowers.', 'Rock Gardens: The park showcases impressive rock formations, including petrified trees and uniquely shaped stones, some estimated to be over 100 million years old.', 'Crocodile Shows: The farm hosts daily crocodile shows, where skilled handlers interact with these reptiles in thrilling performances.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['The park operates daily from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.']}
short_description: A unique attraction featuring ancient rock formations, exotic plants, a crocodile farm, and thrilling animal shows.

name: Wong Amat Beach
description: {'Information': ["Wong Amat Beach, located in the northern part of Pattaya, Thailand, is renowned for its serene atmosphere and clean sands. Spanning approximately 1.3 kilometers along the Naklua Bay peninsula, it offers a tranquil retreat from the city's more bustling areas."], 'Key Features': ['Peaceful Environment: Unlike the busier Pattaya Beach, Wong Amat provides a quieter setting, making it ideal for relaxation.', 'Water Activities: Visitors can enjoy activities such as jet skiing and parasailing.', 'Proximity to Amenities: The beach is adjacent to several luxury hotels and condominiums, offering easy access to dining and shopping options.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Best Time to Visit: The period between November and February offers pleasant weather conditions.']}
short_description: A tranquil 1.3 km beach in northern Pattaya, ideal for relaxation and water activities.

name: Underwater World Pattaya
description: {'Information': ['Underwater World Pattaya is a prominent aquarium located in Pattaya, Thailand, offering visitors an immersive experience into the diverse marine life of the region.', 'The facility features a 105-meter-long clear acrylic tunnel, providing a 180-degree view of various sea creatures, simulating the experience of walking on the ocean floor.'], 'Key Features': ['Diverse Marine Life: The aquarium houses over 5,000 marine animals, including species native to the Gulf of Thailand and beyond.', 'Themed Zones: Visitors can explore multiple zones, such as the Coral Reef Zone, Shark and Stingray Zone, and the Giant of Siam Zone, each showcasing different aquatic environments.', 'Interactive Experiences: The Touch Pool Zone allows guests to have hands-on interactions with various marine creatures, enhancing the educational aspect of the visit.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['daily from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, with the last admission at 5:30 PM.']}
short_description: A 105-meter underwater tunnel in Pattaya showcasing over 5,000 marine animals across various themed zones.

name: Wat Chai Mongkhon
description: {'Information': ["Wat Chai Mongkhon is a historic Buddhist temple located in the heart of Pattaya, Thailand. Built around 1857 during the late reign of King Rama IV, it stands as one of the city's oldest and most significant religious sites."], 'Key Features': ['Architectural Beauty: The temple complex boasts traditional Thai architecture, with intricately designed structures and statues that reflect the rich cultural heritage of the region.', 'Chedi (Stupa): A prominent feature of the temple is its chedi, constructed to house Buddhist relics brought back from Langka.', 'Serene Atmosphere: Despite its central location, the temple offers a peaceful retreat from the bustling city, providing visitors with a tranquil environment for reflection and prayer.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['The temple is open daily from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.']}
short_description: A historic Buddhist temple in central Pattaya, known for its traditional architecture and serene atmosphere.

name: Pattaya Elephant Village
description: {'Information': ['Pattaya Elephant Village, established in 1973, serves as a sanctuary for former working elephants, offering visitors a glimpse into the daily lives of these majestic creatures and their handlers.'], 'Key Features': ['Elephant Performances: The village showcases traditional elephant training techniques and daily routines, providing insight into the bond between elephants and their mahouts.', 'Cultural Shows: Visitors can enjoy cultural performances, including traditional Thai dances, enhancing the overall experience.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Alternative Experiences: For those seeking more ethical interactions, consider visiting sanctuaries that focus on observation and care without performances or rides.']}
short_description: A sanctuary established in 1973, offering insights into the lives of former working elephants and their handlers.

name: Ripley's Believe It or Not! Museuam
description: {'Information': ["Ripley's Believe It or Not! in Pattaya is a renowned family-friendly attraction located on the second floor of the Royal Garden Plaza.", 'The museum showcases over 350 intriguing exhibits across more than 10 themed galleries, blending the bizarre, the shocking, and the beautiful.'], 'Key Features': ['Odditorium: A collection of over 350 unique exhibits, including primitive torture devices, a mask made from human skin, and a real human shrunken head.', 'Swimming with Dolphins: For an immersive experience, guests can opt to swim alongside dolphins under the guidance of professional trainers, creating unforgettable memories.', 'The Vault Laser Maze Challenge: A timed event where participants navigate through a web of lasers, aiming to reach the end without breaking any beams.', 'Infinity Maze: A 20-minute journey through a maze with spectacular illusions, innovative lighting effects, and atmospheric music.', 'Horror Hospital: An attraction that invites visitors to discover the truth behind the closed doors of a creepy hospital with sinister secrets and mysterious tales.', 'The Lost Pyramid: An edutainment adventure exploring one of the Seven Wonders of the World, uncovering the mysteries of ancient Egypt.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Open daily from 11:00 AM to 11:00 PM.']}
short_description: A family-friendly attraction in Pattaya featuring over 350 unique exhibits and multiple interactive experiences.

name: Pattaya dolphinarium
description: {'Information': ['Pattaya Dolphinarium is a premier marine attraction in Pattaya, Thailand, offering visitors the chance to witness captivating performances by bottlenose dolphins and South American seals.', 'The facility emphasizes interactive experiences, allowing guests to connect closely with these intelligent marine mammals.'], 'Key Features': ['Dolphin and Seal Shows: Enjoy dynamic performances where dolphins and seals showcase their agility and intelligence through various acrobatics and synchronized routines.', 'Swimming with Dolphins: For an immersive experience, guests can opt to swim alongside dolphins under the guidance of professional trainers, creating unforgettable memories.', 'Photography Sessions: Capture memorable moments by taking photos with the dolphins and seals, preserving the experience for years to come.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Daily: 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM', 'Closed on Wednesdays']}
short_description: Experience engaging dolphin and seal shows, with options for personal interactions and memorable photo opportunities.

name: Wat Phra Yai Temple
description: {'Information': ['Wat Phra Yai, commonly known as the Big Buddha Temple, is a prominent Buddhist temple located atop Pratumnak Hill in Pattaya, Thailand.', 'The temple is renowned for its impressive 18-meter-tall golden Buddha statue, which stands as the largest in the Chonburi region.', 'Constructed in the 1940s, Wat Phra Yai has been a significant spiritual site for both locals and visitors. The grand Buddha statue was added in 1977, symbolizing prosperity and protection.', 'Over the years, the temple has become a focal point for religious activities and cultural tourism in Pattaya.'], 'Key Features': ['Giant Golden Buddha: The centerpiece of the temple is the 18-meter-tall golden Buddha statue, which can be seen from various points in the city.', 'Ornate Staircase: Visitors ascend a staircase flanked by golden Naga serpents, leading up to the main platform.', 'Panoramic Views: The hilltop location offers sweeping views of Pattaya Bay and the surrounding cityscape.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['The temple is open daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 PM.', 'Footwear: Shoes must be removed before entering certain areas of the temple.']}
short_description: An 18-meter golden Buddha atop Pratumnak Hill, offering spiritual insights and panoramic city views.

name: Ramayana Water Park
description: {'Information': ["Ramayana Water Park, located approximately 20 kilometers south of Pattaya, is Thailand's largest water park, spanning over 184,000 square meters.", 'Established in 2016, it offers a blend of thrilling water attractions and cultural themes inspired by ancient legends.'], 'Key Features': ['Diverse Water Slides: The park boasts 21 water slides, including unique attractions like the Aqua Coaster and Python and Aquaconda slides.', 'Themed Zones: Ramayana is divided into four themed zones, each reflecting different aspects of ancient legends and myths.', "Family-Friendly Areas: Two extensive kids' zones are designed for younger visitors, ensuring fun and safety."], 'Visiting Tips': ['Operating Hours: The park operates daily from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM, except on Wednesdays when it is closed.', 'Amenities: Facilities include private cabanas, multiple dining options offering various cuisines, and secure lockers for personal belongings.']}
short_description: Thailand's largest water park, featuring 21 unique slides and four themed zones inspired by ancient legends.

name: Tiger Park Zoo
description: {'Information': ['Tiger Park Pattaya offers visitors the unique opportunity to observe and interact with tigers in a controlled environment.', 'The park emphasizes that their tigers are raised by professionals and are accustomed to human presence, aiming to ensure safety during interactions.'], 'Key Features': ['Close Encounters: Visitors can choose to enter enclosures with tigers of various ages and sizes, under the supervision of trained staff.', 'Photography: Guests are encouraged to take photos with the tigers using their own devices at no additional charge.'], 'Visiting Tips': ["Booking: It's advisable to book tickets in advance, especially during peak tourist seasons.", 'Safety First: Always follow the instructions provided by the trainers to ensure a safe experience.', 'The park operates daily from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.']}

name: Sanctuary of Truth
description: {'Information': ['The Sanctuary of Truth is a unique wooden temple in Pattaya, built entirely from teak wood without nails. It was initiated in 1981 by Thai businessman Lek Viriyaphan and remains under continuous construction.', 'The temple embodies a fusion of Eastern philosophies, incorporating Buddhist, Hindu, Chinese, and Khmer influences to convey wisdom, spirituality, and the impermanence of life.'], 'Key Features': ['100% Wooden Structure: Built without nails, featuring intricate hand-carved sculptures.', 'Towering Height: Stands at 105 meters, making it the tallest all-wood structure in Thailand.', 'Detailed Carvings: Depicts myths, legends, and spiritual concepts from various Asian cultures.'], 'Visiting Tips': ['Best Time to Visit: Early morning or late afternoon to avoid crowds and heat.', 'Daily: 8:00 AM – 6:00 PM']}
short_description: A majestic 105m-tall wooden temple with intricate carvings reflecting Eastern spiritual wisdom.

name: Neptune Fountain
description: {'Information:': ['The Neptune Fountain is one of the famous landmarks in the city of Batumi, and it features its unique design that includes a huge statue of the god Neptune.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The fountain was opened in 2007 as part of the beauty of the city of Batumi, and it is one of the most prominent landmarks of the city that combines art and cultural symbolism related to the sea.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['The huge statue of Neptune, which represents the god of the sea in Roman myths.', 'Wonderful water fountain design appears with picturesque night lighting.', 'Decorative fountain circumference that adds aesthetic to the place.'], 'working hours:': ['The fountain is open throughout the day and its lighting usually operates from 7:00 pm until midnight.']}
short_description: The Nepteon fountain is characterized by the Neptune statue and a great water design with attractive night lighting.

name: Batami Piazza Square
description: {'Information:': ['Piaza Square is one of the most amazing squares in the city of Batumi, and it features an artistic architectural design that combines Italian and marine style.'], 'Historical importance:': ['Piaza Square is a symbol of the cultural mix in Batumi, as it was developed to be a major tourist destination that attracts visitors from around the world.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Decorative buildings with an Italian character.', 'The clock tower is one of the most prominent landmarks in the square.', 'Cafes and restaurants surrounding the square.', 'Technical statues and distinctive architectural details.'], 'working hours:': ['The square is open throughout the day, cafes and neighboring restaurants usually operate from 9:00 am until 11:00 pm.']}
short_description: Piazumi Square features an Italian architectural design, a clock tower, and cafes.

name: Europe Square
description: {'Information:': ['European Square is one of the most important squares in the city of Batumi, Georgia, and is a central gathering point for tourists and local population.'], 'Historical importance:': ["The square is a symbol of the city's architectural development after independence, as it has been renewed and expanded in the last decade to become a major cultural and commercial center."], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Apollo statue: represents European culture.', 'Historical buildings are around the square, including municipal building.', 'Beautiful fountains and open gardens.'], 'working hours:': ['The square is open throughout the day for visitors and surrounding places such as cafes and shops usually operate from 9:00 am until 10:00 pm.']}
short_description: European Square in Batumi is a cultural and commercial center, characterized by the Apollo statue and historical buildings.

name: ‪Argo Cable Car‬
description: {'Information:': ['Argo cable car is a distinctive means of transportation located in the city of Batumi, Georgia, and visitors take a fun trip over the city to the top of the Argo Mountain where they can enjoy charming panoramic views of the city, the Black Sea, and the surrounding mountains.'], 'Historical importance:': ['The Argo cable car was opened in 2009, and it is considered one of the most prominent features of modern tourism in Batumi and this project is part of the updates that the city has witnessed in the past two decades with the aim of strengthening the tourism sector.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Charming landscapes of the city and the coast.', 'Mount Argo, which is considered a special place to visit.', 'A memorial reflects the history of the region.', 'Stop stations in the middle where travelers can enjoy short tours.'], 'working hours:': ['In the summer: from 9:00 am until 11:00 pm.', 'In the winter: from 10:00 am to 7:00 pm, it is always recommended to check the official website of the Telefrick for accurate working hours by date.']}
short_description: Argo cable car in Batumi offers picturesque panoramic scenes of the city and the Black Sea from the Summit of Jabal Argo.

name: Ali & Nino Statue
description: {'Information:': ['A moving statue embodies a famous love story between Ali Al -Muslim and Christianity, symbolizing unity and tolerance.'], 'Historical importance:': ['Inspired by the novel "Ali and Nino", which tells a tragic love story during World War I between a young Azerbaijani and Georgian girl.', 'It reflects the cultural interaction between East and West, and is considered a symbol of cross -border love.'], 'The most prominent landmarks:': ['Two statues are slowly moving towards each other every evening, until they merged for a moment and then separated again.', 'Made of 8 meters high, located on the Black Sea Corniche.'], 'working hours:': ['Open throughout the day, it can be visited at any time.']}
short_description: The statue of Ali and Nino in Batumi embodies an immortal love story with a mobile movement, a symbol of unity and cultural tolerance.
